QuestData.Title: The Journal of Val'zareq: Portends of War
QuestData.Description: This journal documents the recent activities of Illidan's armies. It also explains why Val'zareq was parading around the Path of Conquest. He was personally responsible for the capture of a high general of the Sha'tar.$B$BThis general is being held at a post known as Crimson Watch, located at the southern end of the Path of Conquest. A mysterious faction, calling itself the Crimson Sigil, is charged with his incarceration. If you choose to investigate, it would be wise to bring allies.
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate Marcus Auralion, High General of the Sha'tar, at Crimson Watch.
